content.rendered:
Emma Lewisham’s hardworking Illuminating Brighten Your Day Crème with triple Vitamin C, Ceramides and AHA/BHA, is scientifically proven to boost collagen production at a cellular level* for plumper looking, lifted and brilliantly bright skin.

Supercharged with hydration heroes Saccharide Isomerate, Pentavitin and Hyaluronic Acid it combines both immediate moisture quenching technology with proven 72-hour deep hydration for skin that is healthy, plump and radiant.

Wild Lime harvest gently exfoliates the skin, helping reveal a smooth, even, glowing texture while Ceramides and collagen rich Sea Algae support further hydration by supporting a balanced, strong skin barrier.

Antioxidant rich Acerola Extract protects the skin and helps to enhance a fresh and renewed complexion. This luxuriously whipped, next generation formulation melts into the skin, giving a subtle, luminous glow and providing your daily dose of radiance.
